context.p: For CM-Portal to use the Munin/Mimer API, Functional ID Token is required. A user must first fetch a refresh token using the Mimer GUI. The refresh token will then be used by the client application. The refresh token is a long-live token (90 days). Once the token details are entered in the CM-Portal for the first time, CM-Portal will automatically update the token every month to avoid its expiry.
Add Mimer Token within the CM Portal.
NOTE: This feature is available only to Admins.

info.p: Click the Mimer Token link in the side Menu.
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Any restrictions on the fields are outlined.

ul.li: Functional ID: Name of the Functional ID.
Refresh Token: Functional ID refresh token, must be obtained using the Mimer GUI for the first time.

info.p: Click the Save button, the Token will be saved in the CM-Portal, and the user will be redirected back to the view page for the added token.
NOTE: Token will not save if the details are incorrect (invalid fields are highlighted in red).

result.p: Mimer Token is added in the CM-Portal.
